servinfo.title: ABS Warning Light Comes ON Steady

servinfosub.title: Wiring Diagram
servinfosub.ptxt: Refer to ABS Warning Light Does Not Come ON at Ignition Switch ON .

servinfosub.title: Circuit Description
servinfosub.ptxt: Operation (ON/OFF) of ABS warning light is controlled by ABS (ESP®) control module through light driver module in combination meter.

If the Antilock brake system is in good condition, ABS (ESP®) control module turns ABS warning light ON at the ignition switch ON, keeps it ON for 2 seconds and then turns it OFF. If an abnormality in the system is detected, ABS warning light is turned ON continuously by ABS (ESP®) control module. Also, it is turned ON continuously by light driver module when the connector of ABS (ESP®) control module is disconnected.

action.ptxt: Go to Step 7 of ABS Check .

testgroup.question: Are main fuses for ABS pump motor and ABS solenoid in good condition?

action.ptxt: Replace fuse and check circuit for short to ground.

test1.ptxt: Disconnect ABS (ESP®) hydraulic unit / control module connector.
Check for proper connection to ABS (ESP®) hydraulic unit / control module connector at terminals “E03-7”, “E03-13” and “E03-26” (or “E53-16”, “E53-35” and “E53-47”.)
If OK then turn ignition switch to ON position and measure voltage between terminal “E03-7” (or “E53-35”) and vehicle body ground.
Turn ignition switch to OFF position.
Check for proper connection to ABS (ESP®) hydraulic unit / control module connector at terminals “E03-1” and “E03-14” (or “E53-1”, “E53-32”).
If OK then turn ignition switch to ON position and measure voltage between each terminal of “E03-1”, “E03-14” (or “E53-1”, “E53-32”) and vehicle body ground.
Turn ignition switch to OFF and measure resistance between each terminal of “E03-13”, “E03-26” (or “E53-16”, “E53-47”) and vehicle body ground.

action.ptxt: Ground circuit for ABS (ESP®) hydraulic unit / control module open or high resistance.

testgroup.ptxt: Check CAN communication circuit between combination meter and ABS (ESP®) hydraulic unit / control module referring to DTC U1073: Control Module Communication Bus Off .
testgroup.question: Is CAN communication circuit in good condition?

action.ptxt: Substitute a known-good combination meter and recheck. If ABS warning light remains ON, substitute a known-good ABS (ESP®) hydraulic unit / control module assembly and recheck.
